body:
LLVM-Package fails to install on Ubuntu 20.04.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
A did a new/clean install of spack before as I am a first-time user.
I was in the process to install hipcycl, so this was part of the invocation:
```
spack install hipsycl@master +cuda
```
Is there something I might have overlooked, or should i provide additional logs?
### Cmd-output:
```
==> Installing llvm-11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur                                                           
==> No binary for llvm-11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur found: installing from source                          
==> Using cached archive: /home/andreas/git/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/8a/8ad4ddbafac4f2c8f2ea523c2c4
196f940e8e16f9e635210537582a48622a5d5.tar.gz                                                                          
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'cmake'                                                                                    
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'build'                                                                                    
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'install'                                                                                  
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:                                                                
    'make' '-j8' 'install'                                                                                            
                                                                                                                      
1 error found in build log:                                                                                           
     68302    -- Up-to-date: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/include/polly                                                   
     68303    -- Up-to-date: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/include/polly/isl                                               
     68304    -- Installing: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/include/polly/isl/stdint.h                                      
     68305    -- Installing: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/lib/libPollyPPCG.a                                              
     68306    -- Installing: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/lib/cmake/polly/PollyConfig.cmake                               
     68307    -- Installing: /home/andreas/git/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-              
              11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/lib/cmake/polly/PollyExports-all.cmake                          
  >> 68308    CMake Error at docs/cmake_install.cmake:46 (file):                                                      
     68309      file INSTALL cannot find                                                                              
     68310      "/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/spack-bu              
              ild-iljgjbi/docs/ocamldoc/html/.":                                                                      
     68311      No such file or directory.                                                                            
     68312    Call Stack (most recent call first):                                                                    
     68313      cmake_install.cmake:85 (include)                                                                      
     68314                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                      
See build log for details:                                                                                            
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev4o6vpssubur/spack-build-out.txt                  
                                                                                                                      
==> Warning: Skipping build of hipsycl-master-r7tne7s4dirbc64bbnl2mgrjvulgizse since llvm-11.0.0-iljgjbiw7lcjhnwqrdrev
4o6vpssubur failed 
```
### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.0-423-16ce20748
* **Python:** 3.7.3
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell
* **Concretizer:** original


### Maintainer-Mentions


@naromero77 @trws 

### General information


- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: llvm-11.0.0
